THE FACTS: -More than 2,000 aliens are apprehended DAILY at the southern border -Since October 2018, more than 268,000 people have been apprehended by border patrol agents -So far, there is a 300% increase from last year in the number of family units apprehended -In February, OVER 76,000 aliens were apprehended or deemed inadmissible at a port of entry TEXT TRUMP" TO 88O 22
